message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $82. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $79?
I understand you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $81. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I really appreciate your flexibility, but I'm getting close to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?
